ai-vv56:1.1_0: “This one whose mind is freed from stones,
ai-vv56:1.3_0: While the seven peaks there are seven gamblings,
ai-vv56:1.4_0: covetousness is like noble crystal lamps,
ai-vv56:2.1_0: There you eat the food and drink.
ai-vv56:2.3_0: Four kinds of sensual stimulation are the five kinds of sensual stimulation.
ai-vv56:2.4_0: they dancing the names, golden flags,
ai-vv56:4.1_0: he is pleased with the god.
ai-vv56:4.3_0: It is the fruit of that deed,
ai-vv56:5.3_0: When you have awakened to the Buddhas,
ai-vv56:5.4_0: where a gift is very fruitful.
ai-vv56:6.1_0: It was truly for my benefit
ai-vv56:6.3_0: filling my mind with confidence in him,
ai-vv56:6.4_0: I was reborn among the gods.
ai-vv56:7.3_0: and my complexion was like me.”
ai-vv56:8.1_0: The sixth ought to be done
